rawContent:
# Business Idea

[idea]
name = "LLM Boilerplate"
tagline = "From idea to working prototype through structured dialogue"
description = """
A file-driven specification system for LLM-assisted development.
Define your project in TOML/Markdown files, get documentation portal
and working React prototype. Optimized for AI-assisted workflows.
"""

[target]
audience = "Developers using LLM assistants for project planning"
problem = "LLMs lack structured context about project specifications"
solution = "File-driven approach with manifest.json for LLM/RAG integration"

[value]
primary = "Single source of truth optimized for LLM consumption"
secondary = "Instant prototype + documentation from specs"
